= Planned Models =

  # *Diffusion on a Directed Network*:  diffusion of a quantity through a directed network
    * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/DiffusiononaDirectedNetwork
  # *Ethnocentrism*:  model of ethnocentric behavior and its evolution
    * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/Ethnocentrism
  # *Preferential Attachment*:  network generation by preferential attachment
    * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/PreferentialAttachment
  # *RepastSim*:  adaptation of discrete-event simulation toolkit originally programmed in VBA
  # *Small Worlds*:  formation of networks resulting in "small world" phenomenon
    * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/SmallWorlds
  # *Team Blackjack*:  exploration of team strategies for blackjack, inspired by [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIT_Blackjack_Team MIT Blackjack Team]
  # *Traffic Grid*:  real-time traffic simulation
    * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/TrafficGrid
  # *Virus on a Network*:  spread of a virus through a network
    * http://ccl.northwestern.edu/netlogo/models/VirusonaNetwork
